title: Tiny Home To Be Featured On FYI Channel's "Tiny House Hunters" To Be Given Away By Casino
text:
Soboba Casino
SAN JACINTO, Calif. , Aug. 31, Sunday, September 27 th , Soboba Casino in San Jacinto, California will be the first casino ever to give away a "tiny home" as their grand prize! With millions of Americans looking to downsize their lives and lessen their carbon footprint, tiny home living is gaining huge traction nationally. At the forefront of the tiny home movement is Soboba Casino, who is bringing tiny home living to Southern California in a big way.
A tiny home built by Rich's Portable Cabins of North Powder, Oregon that will be featured on an episode of FYI's "Tiny House Hunters" in October of 2015 will be given away during Soboba Casino's "Living Large in a Tiny Home " promotion in September. According to Michael J. Broderick , Soboba's Director of Marketing, "Tiny homes are making a big impact in popular culture today, and Soboba Casino wants to be a part of that. We can't think of a better way to be socially conscious and have an exciting grand prize for our guests at the same time." He continued with: "While other casinos are trying to 'go big' we realize that our customers want us to 'go tiny' and that is just what we did!"
So why are people electing to go small and making the move to tiny homes? It's simple, living tiny has big benefits. Between less time spent cleaning, cost effective utility bills, and eco-friendly living, tiny homes gear towards a stress-free dwelling environment and living simply is key.
The home may be little, but Soboba Casino and Rich's Portable Cabins didn't skimp, one lucky new home owner will be living lavishly in a 176 square foot tiny home of their very own. Anyone could be the winner of this tiny home, to enter for a chance to win, guests must earn 500 Points with their Club Soboba Card on the promotion day between the hours of 12:01 AM and 9:59 PM . Guests will also have a chance to win a bonus entry into the drawing by participating in Soboba Casino's Tiny Home Giant Free Play promotion. Saturdays and Sundays between September 12 th and 27 th two winners will be drawn every half hour to receive $1,000 in Free Slot Play and a bonus entry for the tiny home drawing.
Not ready to go minimal? Tiny homes are extremely versatile and can be used for virtually any extended stay purpose. Feel like taking a luxurious camping trip? You're in luck, this tiny home is also portable and easily towed. Which is exactly what drew in Soboba's General Manager Scott Sirois . "You can take the comfort of home wherever you go," Sirois said of the tiny home that rests in front of the casino for viewing. Guests can see the tiny home for themselves at Soboba Casino where tours of the interior will be regularly scheduled during the weekends.
So, whether you're moving in or packing the family up for a trip, or aching to move a family member out, one thing is for sure, Soboba Casino is bringing tiny home living to Southern California on September 27 th and someone is going to be taking home the grand prize.
Soboba Casino features approximately 2,000 of the newest, hottest slot machines, an expansive and modern non-smoking room, 20 classic gaming tables featuring all your favorite card games, and a large outdoor event arena which easily accommodates over 10,000 people. Need to recharge & refresh? Visit the cozy Soboba Cafe and Coffee Kiicha, or experience AC's Lounge with full cocktail bar and three giant HD flat screens including the "Sobobatron", the Inland Empire's biggest HD video wall.
Soboba Casino is proudly owned and operated by the Soboba Band of Luiseno Indians. Come join us for all the fun and then some! Soboba Casino. Where Everybody Goes to Play! For more information visit: soboba.com
